title: How to play videos with MOV format
body:
I'm using this library to play videos inside recyclerview, the videos are played via URL coming from json.

The problem is that some videos have .MOV format not MP4, and they won't play! I did some digging and it's obvious that .MOV format isn't supported natively by android and the library isn't supporting it either.!?

But come on guys, really.. there has to be a way!? Is there like an api for converting video formats, just giving it URL of the video and it will return it as MP4 !? Anything?
